mapper.select: SELECT P.pkgId, p.pkgName, m.memberID, d.subsDate, p.finalPrice, p.difficulty, p.personnel, p.pkgContent, g.groupMem, NVL2(g.groupID, g.groupID, 'NOT GROUP') AS groupID, ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(groupMem), 0) FROM study_group WHERE pkgId = P.pkgId ) AS totalgroupMem, (p.personnel - ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(groupMem), 0) FROM study_group WHERE pkgId = P.pkgId )) AS possiblegroupMem FROM package p JOIN PKGSUBSDETAIL D ON P.pkgId = D.pkgId JOIN member m ON D.memberID = m.memberID LEFT JOIN study_group g ON D.pkgId = g.pkgId WHERE p.elimination = 'N' AND m.mType = 'T' AND m.memberID = 'memberID6'

SELECT P.pkgId, p.pkgName, m.memberID, d.subsDate, p.finalPrice, p.difficulty, p.personnel, p.pkgContent, g.groupMem, NVL2(g.groupID, g.groupID, 'NOT GROUP') AS groupID, ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(groupMem), 0) FROM study_group WHERE pkgId = P.pkgId ) AS totalgroupMem, (p.personnel - ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(groupMem), 0) FROM study_group WHERE pkgId = P.pkgId )) AS possiblegroupMem FROM package p JOIN PKGSUBSDETAIL D ON P.pkgId = D.pkgId JOIN member m ON D.memberID = m.memberID LEFT JOIN study_group g ON D.pkgId = g.pkgId WHERE p.elimination = 'N' AND m.mType = 'T' AND m.memberID = 'memberID6' and D.pkgName = #{pkgName}
